message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you $1000 and keep $9000.
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I think I deserve more for being the one making the offer this round
I think you're being a bit too greedy, Bob. I'll wait for a better offer.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Take $3000 and let me have $7000.
I'll meet you halfway, Alice. Let's split it 50/50 this time
Alright, Bob, you've convinced me. 50/50 it is!
